brand_identity.name: CareLens AI
brand_identity.mission: Democratizing healthcare access for Rural India with the speed of Rapido and the trust of a family doctor.
brand_identity.target_audience: Rural Indian population, mobile-first users, semi-literate users, local doctors.

typography.instructions: Use 'Outfit' for all headings to give a modern, geometric, app-like feel. Use 'Manrope' for body text for maximum readability on low-end devices.

primary.name: Life Green
primary.usage: Main CTAs, Success States, Brand Identity

layout_strategies.mobile_first: Always design for 360px width first. Use bottom sheets for interactions instead of modals on mobile.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-[#00C853] hover:bg-[#009624] text-white font-bold px-8 py-3 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.emergency: rounded-full bg-[#FFAB00] hover:bg-[#FF6D00] text-black font-bold px-8 py-3 shadow-lg hover:shadow-red-200 animate-pulse
buttons.outline: rounded-full border-2 border-[#00C853] text-[#00C853] hover:bg-[#00C853] hover:text-white px-8 py-3 transition-all

cards.base: bg-white rounded-2xl shadow-md border border-gray-100 overflow-hidden hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow

inputs.base: w-full rounded-xl border-gray-300 focus:border-[#00C853] focus:ring-[#00C853] py-3 px-4 bg-gray-50 focus:bg-white transition-colors

navigation.mobile_bottom_bar: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white border-t border-gray-200 shadow-[0_-4px_6px_-1px_rgba(0,0,0,0.1)] z-50 flex justify-around py-3 pb-6
navigation.header: sticky top-0 z-40 w-full backdrop-blur-lg bg-white/80 border-b border-gray-100

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on solid color backgrounds to reduce digital flatness.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons. Use filled variants for active states, outlined for inactive.

landing.hero_style: Split screen: Left text, Right 3D/Image. Use 'Emergency Amber' for the 'Call Ambulance' CTA in the nav.
landing.features_grid: Bento grid style with colorful backgrounds for each feature card.

hospital_finder.layout: Full screen map with a floating bottom sheet (z-index 50) for hospital list. Map pins should be custom markers.
hospital_finder.card_style: Compact horizontal cards with 'Distance' and 'Time' highlighted in green.

ai_chat.interface: WhatsApp-style chat interface. Friendly, colorful bubbles. User: #E0F2F1 (Light Teal), AI: #FFFFFF (White).
ai_chat.input_area: Floating pill-shaped input bar at the bottom.

animations.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'framer-motion' for all page transitions and micro-interactions.
Ensure the map component (e.g., react-leaflet or google-maps-react) takes full height on the Hospital Finder page.
Implement the 'Emergency Ambulance' button as a slide-to-act or long-press to prevent accidental clicks, but make it visually distinct.
For the Multilingual AI, use a dropdown to select languages (Tamil, Hindi, English, etc.) prominently in the chat header.
Use the provided image URLs for placeholders. Do not leave empty src attributes.
ALL interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Follow the Mobile-First approach strictly. Test layouts on 360px width.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; }.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons. Use Lucide icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, entrance animations.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
